data.name: Blob Person Demo
data.detailed_description:
Blob Person is a Low Poly Classic Platformer

An adventurous Blob Person is transported to a simulacrum of his own world. An enigmatic entity follows their every move. How did Blob Person get here? and why? Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to uncover the truth of this strange place and escape.
data.about_the_game:
Blob Person is a Low Poly Classic Platformer

An adventurous Blob Person is transported to a simulacrum of his own world. An enigmatic entity follows their every move. How did Blob Person get here? and why? Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to uncover the truth of this strange place and escape.
data.short_description: An adventurous Blob Person is transported to a simulacrum of his own world. An enigmatic entity follows their every move. How did Blob Person get here? and why? Solve puzzles and overcome obstacles to uncover the truth of this strange place and escape.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 | AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon HD 7850 (2 GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7,8.1 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500K | AMD FX-8350 or newer
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960 (2 GB) | AMD Radeon RX 480 or newer
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
